title: The Amygdala Unpacked with Dr. Joseph LeDoux (174)
description: Tune in as we follow up on last week's episode, and sit down with amygdala expert, Dr. Joseph LeDoux. We discuss the non-conscious versus unconscious, protein synthesis, the differences between fear and threat, and how it all applies in the world of attachment.
itunes:subtitle: Get the skinny on this "cultural meme" and where it points us for treatment
itunes:summary: The amygdala has become a "cultural meme" - so let's get the science-based updated story of it's role in human relationship regulation.  We are honored to have Dr. Joseph LaDoux join us to bring us the facts.  We discuss the amygdala, the threat response system in general, non-conscious states and directions for therapy.  More www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes.   Join our online community www.therapistuncensored.com/join
itunes:author: Dr. Joseph LaDoux
itunes:title: Unpacking the Amygdala with Dr. Joseph LaDoux
